result.eng: His talent is that he understands people.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.

result.eng: She has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a churShe has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aici ceisteanna cliste a ċurShe has a talent for asking clever questions.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
result.html: Tabharfar liúntas de bhua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfar liúntas de ḃua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: The Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.
